# id: TaskAsyncCallTest -> @Test 	public void testSetsUserCodeClassLoader() throws Exception
commentText: Asserts that {@link StatefulTask#triggerCheckpoint(CheckpointMetaData, CheckpointOptions)},_{@link StatefulTask#notifyCheckpointComplete(long)}, and {@link StoppableTask#stop()} are_invoked by a thread whose context class loader is set to the user code class loader.
codeText: @Test_	public void testSetsUserCodeClassLoader() throws Exception {_		numCalls = 1___		Task task = createTask(ContextClassLoaderInterceptingInvokable.class)__		try (TaskCleaner ignored = new TaskCleaner(task)) {_			task.startTaskThread()___			awaitLatch.await()___			task.triggerCheckpointBarrier(1, 1, CheckpointOptions.forCheckpoint())__			task.notifyCheckpointComplete(1)__			task.stopExecution()___			triggerLatch.await()__			notifyCheckpointCompleteLatch.await()__			stopLatch.await()___			assertThat(classLoaders, hasSize(greaterThanOrEqualTo(3)))__			assertThat(classLoaders, everyItem(instanceOf(TestUserCodeClassLoader.class)))__		}_	}
